short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight and extract custom attributes for any tag on a webpage!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Firefly Inspector is a powerful Chrome extension designed to simplify the process of inspecting and highlighting specific elements on any webpage. With this tool, you can easily highlight elements based on your chosen tag and attribute, making it an ideal solution for developers, testers, and anyone working with web content.

The extension allows you to pick a custom highlight color and visually identify elements with specific attributes instantly. Additionally, you can click on highlighted elements to copy their attribute values to the clipboard, saving you time and effort in extracting important information.

Firefly Inspector also supports a reset function to clear all highlights with a single click. A built-in dark mode ensures comfortable use in low-light environments, and your settings are saved automatically, so you can pick up right where you left off.

Whether youâ€™re debugging, validating code, or exploring webpage structure, Firefly Inspector offers an efficient and user-friendly way to inspect and interact with webpage elements. Install it today to streamline your workflow and enhance your productivity!
